original_text: And shall cast them into a furnace of fire: there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth.
korean_text: 풀무 불에 던져 넣으리니 거기서 울며 이를 갈게 되리라

sentences.original_text: And shall cast them into a furnace of fire
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들을 불광 풀무에 던질 것이니

sentences.original_text: there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth
